titles.title: Honoring the life and achievements of Lena Calhoun Horne.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: 5/11/2010--Introduced. Recognizes the trail-blazing achievements of Lena Horne in our nation's entertainment industry. Pays tribute to Lena Horne, her talent, her fight for civil rights, her patriotism, and her groundbreaking achievements.
